name: v0.8.12
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_dotnet",
    sha256 = "77575d68c609d98b92f3df8db79944e7b60c035766e1c233349aeb1659c86ff9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_dotnet-0.8.12",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/releases/download/v0.8.12/rules_dotnet-v0.8.12.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@rules_dotnet//dotnet:repositories.bzl",
    "dotnet_register_toolchains",
    "rules_dotnet_dependencies",
)

rules_dotnet_dependencies()

# Here you can specify the version of the .NET SDK to use.
dotnet_register_toolchains("dotnet", "7.0.101")

load("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:rules_dotnet_nuget_packages.bzl", "rules_dotnet_nuget_packages")

rules_dotnet_nuget_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* Add attribute to set /nullable flag to C# compiler by @fedemartinezdev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/355


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.8.11...v0.8.12

```starlark
# Here you can specify the version of the .NET SDK to use.

load("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:rules_dotnet_nuget_packages.bzl", "rules_dotnet_nuget_packages")
```



## What's Changed
* Make compatible with Bazel 7.0 by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/334
* fixed nuget structure for netstandard20 and netstandard21 by @Place1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/335
* fix: include runtime files in resolved toolchain #298 by @Place1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/336
* Update .Net SDK versions and RIDs by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/338

## New Contributors
* @Place1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/335

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.8.4...v0.8.5

name: v0.8.0
body:
Initial `next` release
======================

This release is the first release of the revamped `rules_dotnet`
The new rules bring better NuGet handling, better binary publishing
and better handling for targeting various framework versions.

While we are still in the 0.x.x versions of the rules we are expecting
some breaking changes to happen in the future releases.

If there is anything that you would like to see added to the rules
then please create an issue for it or join the #dotnet channel on
the Bazel slack (https://slack.bazel.build/)

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_dotnet",
    sha256 = "a33b9184b6da5208fe8de93bbd94da7b75ad06cd44146f023ccd6dbbfb2b169b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_dotnet-0.8.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/archive/refs/tags/v0.8.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@rules_dotnet//dotnet:repositories.bzl",
    "dotnet_register_toolchains",
    "rules_dotnet_dependencies",
)

rules_dotnet_dependencies()

# Here you can specify the version of the .NET SDK to use.
dotnet_register_toolchains("dotnet", "7.0.101")

load("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:rules_dotnet_nuget_packages.bzl", "rules_dotnet_nuget_packages")

rules_dotnet_nuget_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix remote execution by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/224
* specify nuget package targetname with nuget2bazel by @samhowes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/227
* Add support for extracting nuget packages from project files by @thelgevold in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/231
* Fix F# type providers by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/232
* Add .Net Core 3.1.13 support by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/241
* Add net5.0 support to nuget2bazel by @tomaszstrejczek in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/242
* .Net 5 Support by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/240
* Remove unneeded toolchain_resolution_debug flags from presubmit. by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/245
* Fix warning in F# compilation by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/244
* Bump rexml from 3.2.4 to 3.2.5 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/247
* Disable prerelease feature for nuget2bazel by @tomaszstrejczek in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/250
* Bump nokogiri from 1.11.1 to 1.11.4 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/251
* Bump nokogiri from 1.11.4 to 1.12.5 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/257
* Add Gitpod to the repo by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/262
* Fix CI pipeline by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/263
* Update the Bazel CI build badge. by @philwo in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/264
* fix indention in workspace boilerplate and remove core_register_sdk by @hsyed-dojo in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/259
* Bump addressable from 2.7.0 to 2.8.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/253
* Fix gRPC example by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/267
* Fix gRPC example for Bazel rolling releases by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/270
* Add .NET SDK 5.0.404 and bump nuget2bazel NuGet dependencies to 5.11.0 by @mjs-rokt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/271
* Add missing platforms to CI by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/272
* Add .NET SDK 6.0.101. Darwin ARM64 support in nuget2bazel. by @mjs-rokt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/273
* Remote exec fixes by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/277
* Update gitpod config by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/283
* Paket support by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/284
* Next: Configurable toolchains by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/285
* Fix issue 287 by @a4z in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/288
* Work in progress PR of `next` branch by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/289
* Test structure by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/290
* Add a runfiles library by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/292
* Add expecto example by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/295
* Dependency resolution fixes by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/301
* Publishing and native dependencies by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/303
* Fix strict deps flag by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/304
* Allow multiple runtime packs by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/307
* Fix Remote Execution by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/311
* Add Type Provider example by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/313
* Fix deps json by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/318
* Fix runtimeconfig for AspNetCore projects by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/323
* Use Bazel 6.0 in CI by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/324
* [Next] Add .Net 7 support by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/325
* [Next] pre merge cleanup by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/326
* Merge next branch by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/327

## New Contributors
* @katre made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/245
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/247
* @hsyed-dojo made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/259
* @mjs-rokt made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/271
* @a4z made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/288

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/0.0.7...v0.8.0
